#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define LL long long
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
#define LD long double
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define pc putchar_unlocked
#define bitcount _builtin_popcount
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAXN 1000090

int N,i,M;
vector<int> V(MAXN,0);

template<typename T>T absll(T X)
{
	if(X<0)
		return -1*X;
	else
		return X;
}


int main()
{
	cin>>N>>M;
	int flip=1;
	for(i=0;i<N;i++)
	{
		cin>>V[i];
		if(V[i]>(M+1)/2)
		{
			flip^=1;
		}
	}
	
	if(!flip)
	{
		cout<<"NO\n";
	}
	else
	{
		cout<<"YES\n";
	}
	V.clear();
	return 0;
}
